examples: We must have been burgled while we were asleep.
Her parents died while she was still at school.
Sus padres murieron mientras ella aún estaba en la escuela.
While I was waiting at the bus stop, three buses went by in the opposite direction.
Mientras esperaba en la parada del autobús, pasaron tres autobuses en sentido contrario.
You can go swimming while I'm having lunch.
Puedes ir a nadar mientras yo almorzo.
